column1: Narrator : The island is a tiny piece of grassy land
Narrator : Not far from CAPITAINE,  a few fruit trees are aligned
column2: Narrator : CAPITAINE wanders into a small orchard
column3: Narrator : CAPITAINE is surrounded by a handful of fruit barring trees.

column7: Narrator : A small chicken house is settled between the bushes

column9: Choice : Let’s go see the hens

column4: PlayerSpeak : Looks like beasts ate it all

column2: OtherSpeak : I saw you strall around my apples.

column4: OtherSpeak : Nothing I can do, my boy
